summary: A pure‑Python implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) and its supporting components, including curve definitions, arithmetic, DER/PEM encoding, key handling, deterministic nonce generation, and version management, packaged as a static dependency for the ccxt library.
business_intent: Provide reliable, self‑contained cryptographic capabilities for generating, signing, and verifying ECDSA signatures, enabling secure authentication and transaction signing in financial and blockchain applications without relying on external native libraries.
